Package weka.gui.visualize

Class PrintablePanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
weka.gui.visualize.PrintablePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, PrintableHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeVisualizationPanel, HierarchyVisualizer, LayoutPanel, TreeVisualizer, VisualizePanel
public class PrintablePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PrintableHandler
This Panel enables the user to print the panel to various file formats. The Print dialog is accessible via Ctrl-Shft-Left Mouse Click.

The individual JComponentWriter-descendants can be accessed by the getWriter(String) method, if the parameters need to be changed.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
See Also:
getWriters(), getWriter(String), Serialized Form
